main event: On April 6, 1955, a 13-year-old school boy observed a round, silver object that appeared to fade away.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of a silver dollar held at arm's length,The sighting lasted for an undisclosed amount of time,The color of the object was reported as red and white,It was concluded to probably be an airway beacon,The sighting was observed in Beaumont, California.
